script.name: !ship.comm.surrender
script.sourceplaintext:
$DELAY.TIME = 30 $DELAY.MAX = 300
if $a.state == 'commcheck' if $a.value == [Comm.Dlg.Contact] OR $a.value == [Comm.Dlg.Enemy] skip if $a.ship ->is ignoring player attacks return [TRUE] end return [FALSE]
else if $a.state == 'text' $text = read text: page=18 id=10021 return $text
else if $a.state == 'question' $status = 0
* compute the takeover chance if $a.ship -> get local variable: name='money.given' $status = 4 add honour points: -10 else if not $a.ship ->is capture disabled if not $a.ship -> is invincible $ship.owner = $a.ship -> get owner race $cur.noto = get notoriety from race $ship.owner to race Player $noto.level = get notoriety level: amount=$cur.noto $add.noto = advance notoriety by percentage: notoriety=$cur.noto, level=$noto.level, percentage=1 do if $add.noto < 10 $add.noto = 10 $add.noto = - $add.noto $ship.owneradd notoriety: race=Player raw value=$add.noto $next.time = $a.ship -> get local variable: name='egosoft.capture.nextcheck' skip if $next.time $next.time = 0 $age = playing time if $age > $next.time $delay.time = $a.ship -> get local variable: name='egosoft.capture.delay' if ! $delay.time OR ( $delay.time > $DELAY.MAX AND $age > ( $next.time + $delay.time ) ) $delay.time = $DELAY.TIME else $delay.time = $delay.time + $delay.time end $a.ship ->set local variable: name='egosoft.capture.delay' value=$delay.time $next.time = $age + $delay.time $a.ship ->set local variable: name='egosoft.capture.nextcheck' value=$next.time
$shield = $a.ship -> get shield percent if $shield <= 10 $hull = $a.ship -> get hull $maxhull = $a.ship -> get max hull $rnd = random value from 0 to 8 - 1 inc $rnd = $maxhull = ( $maxhull * $rnd ) / 8 if $hull <= $maxhull $morale = $a.ship -> get pilot morale $chance = 25 - $morale
$honour = get honour points $honour = $honour / 5 do if $honour > 10 $honour = 10 do if $honour < -20 $honour = -20
$chance = $chance + $honour
do if $a.ship -> get local variable: name='money.given' $chance = $chance - 20
$player.strength = [PLAYERSHIP] ->get strength $ship.strength = $a.ship ->get strength do if $player.strength < $ship.strength $chance = $chance - 5
* lower hull increases chance $hull.percent = $a.ship -> get hull percent if $hull.percent < 30 $hullch = ( 30 - $hull.percent ) / 2 else if $hull.percent > 70 $hullch = -5 else $hullch = 0 end $chance = $chance + $hullch
* lower the chance each attempt $chance = $chance - ( $delay.time / $DELAY.TIME ) $rnd = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 if $rnd < $chance $status = 1 end end end end end end
if $status != 1 $chance = 0 if $a.ship -> is of class Fighter $chance = 10 else if $a.ship -> is of class Big Ship $chance = 20 else if $a.ship -> is of class Huge Ship $chance = 30 end
$player.strength = [PLAYERSHIP] ->get strength $ship.strength = $a.ship ->get strength do if $player.strength < $ship.strength $chance = $chance + 10
$ship.owner = $a.ship -> get true owner $sector = $a.ship -> get sector $sector.owner = $sector -> get owner race * if a pirate, bigger chance of becomin hostile do if $ship.owner == Pirates OR $ship.owner == Yaki $chance = $chance + 30 * increase chance if its thier own sector do if $sector.owner == $ship.owner $chance = $chance + 20
$age = playing time $last.try = $a.ship -> get local variable: name='egosoft.comm.capture.lasttry' $trys = $a.ship -> get local variable: name='egosoft.comm.capture.try' do if ! $last.try OR $age > $last.try $trys = 0
$chance = $chance + ( $trys * 8 )
inc $trys = $a.ship ->set local variable: name='egosoft.comm.capture.try' value=$trys $age = $age + 300 $a.ship ->set local variable: name='egosoft.comm.capture.lasttry' value=$age
do if $a.ship -> is [PLAYERSHIP] a enemy $chance = 100
$rnd = 20 - $trys do if $rnd < 1 $rnd = 1 if not random value from 0 to $rnd - 1 $status = 4 else $rnd = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 if $rnd < $chance $status = 2 if $sector.owner == $ship.owner do if random value from 0 to 2 - 1 $status = 3 end end end end
if $status == 0 if not $a.ship -> get local variable: name='money.given' if not random value from 0 to 6 - 1 $status = 5 end end end
$a.ship ->set local variable: name='egosoft.comm.capture' value=$status $voice = $a.ship ->get pilot voice if $status == 1 $speakarray = create new array, arguments=$voice, 28, null, null, null else if $status == 3 $speakarray = create new array, arguments=$voice, 27, null, null, null else if $status == 2 $speakarray = create new array, arguments=$voice, 27, null, null, null else if $status == 5 $speakarray = create new array, arguments=$voice, 29, null, null, null else if $a.ship -> is [PLAYERSHIP] a enemy $speakarray = create new array, arguments=$voice, 27, null, null, null else $speakarray = create new array, arguments=$voice, 25, null, null, null end return $speakarray
* no answers else if $a.state == 'answers' return null
else if $a.state == 'accepted' $status = $a.ship -> get local variable: name='egosoft.comm.capture' if $status == 1 $ship.owner = $a.ship -> get owner race $ship.sector = $a.ship -> get sector $sector.owner = $ship.sector -> get owner race if $ship.owner == $sector.owner skip if random value from 0 to 4 - 1 = register threat: race=$ship.owner, sector=$ship.sector, object=[PLAYERSHIP], type=[Threat.Generic], expire=180s, severity=1 end $a.ship ->force eject pilot: attacker=[PLAYERSHIP] unlock achievement: id='ACH_SURRENDER' else if $status == 2 $a.ship ->set relation against Player to Foe $a.ship ->set relation against [PLAYERSHIP] to Foe START $a.ship -> command COMMAND_ATTACK : arg1=[PLAYERSHIP], arg2=null, arg3=null, arg4=null else if $status == 3 $sector = $a.ship -> get sector $sector.owner = $sector -> get owner race $ship.owner = $a.ship -> get owner race $a.ship ->set relation against Player to Foe START $a.ship -> command COMMAND_ATTACK : arg1=[PLAYERSHIP], arg2=null, arg3=null, arg4=null $aTradeStations = find station: sector=$sector class or type=Trading Dock race=$sector.owner flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=100 refpos=null if $aTradeStations $i = size of array $aTradeStations while $i dec $i = $dock = $aTradeStations[$i] $dock ->set relation against Player to Foe end end = register threat: race=$ship.owner, sector=$sector, object=[PLAYERSHIP], type=[Threat.CallForHelp], expire=600s, severity=1
else if $status == 4 $a.ship ->set relation against Player to Foe START $a.ship -> command COMMAND_ATTACK : arg1=[PLAYERSHIP], arg2=null, arg3=null, arg4=null $ship.owner = $a.ship -> get owner race = register threat: race=$ship.owner, sector=$sector, object=[PLAYERSHIP], type=[Threat.Aggressive], expire=600s, severity=2 else if $status == 5 $ship.type = $a.ship -> get ware type code of object $money = get average price of ware $ship.type $min = ( $money * 10 ) / 100 $max = ( $money * 20 ) / 100 $money = random value from $min to $max - 1 $m = get maintype of ware Credits $s = get subtype of ware Credits $sector = $a.ship -> get sector $x = $a.ship -> get x position $y = $a.ship -> get y position $z = $a.ship -> get z position $crate = create flying ware: maintype=$m subtype=$s count=$money sector=$sector x=$x y=$y z=$z selfdestruct=[TRUE] $a.ship ->set local variable: name='money.given' value=[TRUE] set player tracking aim to $crate -> end $a.ship ->set local variable: name='egosoft.comm.capture' value=null
else if $a.state == 'rejected' $a.ship ->set local variable: name='egosoft.comm.capture' value=null
else if $a.state == 'removecomm' return [Comm.Surrender] end return null

comment.var: if a pirate, bigger chance of becomin hostile
increase chance if its thier own sector

line.text: get ware type code of object

sval.val: if a pirate, bigger chance of becomin hostile
increase chance if its thier own sector
